definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: ((the) Exalted One is (my) father (v. Bae:Rel 156) cf. As. Aburamu (?) KAT:2 479 cf. Dl:L2, p. 91, 1. 225).
a Reubenite, son of Eliab Nu 16:1, Nu 16:12, Nu 16:24, Nu 16:25, Nu 16:27, Nu 16:27, Nu 26:9, De 11:6, Ps 106:17.
son of Hiel the Bethelite 1Ki 16:34. Cf. also following.
